post:
vpsAO.com – 2GB VPS for $18/year & more special deals in Los Angeles, CA!

colocrossing, cryptocurrency, ipv4, los angeles, openvz, paypal, psychz, QuadraNet, SolusVM, vpsao April 17, 2019 @ 10:00 am, by Frank Williams

Kevin from vpsAO (which is now owned by RC Portfolio) recently wrote in to us to share their new Los Angeles VPS offers with the community. They were featured once before on LEB, and have received good feedback. vpsAO is under new management since October 2018, but the company itself has been in business since 2016.

Their WHOIS is public, and you can find their ToS/Legal Docs here. They accept PayPal, Credit Cards, Cryptocurrency and Alipay as payment methods.

Here’s what they had to say:

“vpsAO is a Los Angeles VPS hosting provider. vpsAO was founded by web developers out of necessity. We saw the lack of quality and non-oversubscribed hosting services in the marketplace, and wanted to revolutionize and set a new standard for the hosting industry.

We’d like to say we’ve been pretty successful in achieving our vision, and continue to fine-tune and implement this vision on a daily basis. Today, vpsAO is home to over 3000 happy customers today, and counting! We believe in building trust through transparency. At vpsAO, we hold ourselves to very high standards and accountability, and this translates to an unparalleled customer experience.”

Here’s the offers:

** FREE Upgrade to 1Gbps Port for all LEB Readers! Open a support ticket mentioning this post after your order has been completed. **

 

2GB VPS

  • 2 CPU Cores
  • 2GB RAM
  • 2GB vSwap
  • 50GB Storage
  • 3000GB Bandwidth
  • 100Mbps Network Port
  • OpenVZ/SolusVM
  • Los Angeles Datacenter
  • rDNS, TUN/TAP/PPP Supported
  • $18/yr
  • [ORDER]

3GB VPS

  • 2 CPU Cores
  • 3GB RAM
  • 3GB vSwap
  • 80GB Storage
  • 5000GB Bandwidth
  • 100Mbps Network Port
  • OpenVZ/SolusVM
  • Los Angeles Datacenter
  • rDNS, TUN/TAP/PPP Supported
  • $25/yr
  • [ORDER]

6GB VPS

  • 4 CPU Cores
  • 6GB RAM
  • 6GB vSwap
  • 100GB Storage
  • 5000GB Bandwidth
  • 100Mbps Network Port
  • OpenVZ/SolusVM
  • Los Angeles Datacenter
  • rDNS, TUN/TAP/PPP Supported
  • $39/yr
  • [ORDER]

Adult content, Tor (relays only), IRC, proxies, and VPN are all allowed. We were also told that TUN/TAP and PPP are available within the control panel.

NETWORK INFO:

vpsAO has infrastructure diversified between three different datacenters within the Los Angeles region.

We’ve been informed that the following offers will be set up in Los Angeles, however there is no predictability as to which datacenter it will be set up in. You will either be provisioned on the QuadraNet, ColoCrossing or Psychz LA datacenter, as these special promotion packages will be set up between their excess/unused space between their infrastructure within those datacenters.

We have been told that at this time, there is no option to select a preferred datacenter because the purpose of the special promotions is to fill up the “empty seats on the bus at a wholesale price,” (the analogy that Kevin mentioned) however, all locations should offer similar latency/performance considering they are all in Los Angeles, and either way – you are getting a decent value server at wholesale-like pricing.

Psychz Los Angeles
Test IPv4: 104.149.18.203
Test file: http://lg.lax.psychz.net/200MB.test

QuadraNet Los Angeles
Test IPv4: 198.55.111.5
Test file: http://repos.lax-noc.com/speedtests/100mb.bin

ColoCrossing Los Angeles

Test file: http://107.175.180.6/100MB.test

Hardware Information:

– Intel Xeon E3 CPU’s
– 32GB to 64GB of RAM
– 4x 2TB Enterprise HDD’s
– Hardware RAID10 with Cache
– Dual 1Gbps Uplinks

If you have any questions or comments, please comment below and enjoy!
